org.iotivity.service.server

Class RcsResourceObject.AttributesLock

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.iotivity.service.server.RcsResourceObject.AttributesLock
  • Enclosing class:
    RcsResourceObject

    public static class RcsResourceObject.AttributesLock
extends java.lang.Object
    This provides the way to get the attributes of RcsResourceObject with lock. When a thread holds the lock, the other threads will be pending until the lock is released by unlock. Here is the standard idiom for AttributesLock: 
     
 AttributesLock lock = rcsResourceObject.getAttributesLock();

 try {
     lock.lock();

     ....

     lock.apply();
 } finally {
     lock.unlock();
 }

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void apply()
      Applies the modified attributes to the RcsResourceObject.
      RcsLockedAttributes lock()
      Locks the attributes of the RcsResourceObject and returns locked attributes that can be modified until unlocked.
      void unlock()
      Changes the state to unlock of the attributes of the RcsResourceObject.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • lock

        public RcsLockedAttributes lock()
                         throws RcsException
        Locks the attributes of the RcsResourceObject and returns locked attributes that can be modified until unlocked.
        Returns:
        Locked attributes.
        Throws:
        RcsException - if the RcsResourceObject is destroyed

      • unlock

        public void unlock()
        Changes the state to unlock of the attributes of the RcsResourceObject.

      • apply

        public void apply()
           throws RcsIllegalStateException
        Applies the modified attributes to the RcsResourceObject.
        Throws:
        RcsIllegalStateException - if not in locked state or RcsPlatformException if auto notify failed
